name: Astra Demo Version 2
description:
Astra is the smallest star in Constellation Station. Tired of being picked on, she sets off on her own adventure to build a new constellation!

Run, jump, slide, and float across thirteen unique levels while collecting stardust to build your new home.

This demo represents the first two levels in their current states as of July 2021. Development is ongoing. although there is not currently a target release date. You can keep up with progress by checking out my Twitter and staying in touch here.

♦
